沪江词库精选heliacal rising是什么意思、中英文句子翻译、英语短语。heliacal rising的中文解释: 偕日升,偕日升相关短语:  heliacal cycle 太阳周  heliacal rising.

means.word_mean: 1. pertaining to or near the sun; especially the first rising of a star after and last setting before its invisibility owing to its conjunction with the sun;

sentences.sentence: "the heliacal rising of the Dog Star"
"the heliacal or Sothic year is determined by the heliacal rising of Sothis (the Egyptian name for the Dog Star)"
